name: Starlynx
description:
Submission for MiniJam #77. Limitation: Game cannot take place on earth, Theme: Courage

Content: You are the pilot Lynx Jaeger and heading to the mission to save your friend. But watch out, the enemy base is well protected. That certainly takes courage!

Controls:
Keyboard: WASD/Arrows and Space
Gamepad: Joystick and A

Idea, art, 3d models and programming: dunkelgrau
Sound: CC0 assets from https://opengameart.org/
Music:
Starcat by Parker Walker (https://www.spiralsystemmusic.com/)
Fonts:
Good Times by Raymond Larabie
Kongtext Font by codeman38
